description: A bone from some creature or other.  Could be used in cooking and crafting.
A rotten, brittle bone from some unnatural creature or other.  Could be used to make some stuff, like charcoal or glue.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.
A bone from a human being.  Could be used to make some stuff, if you're feeling sufficiently ghoulish.
A bone from a demihuman being.  Could be used to make some stuff, if you're feeling sufficiently ghoulish.
